entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 80
